DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of repeated doses of Botulinum Toxin Type A for the treatment of focal upper limb poststroke spasticity
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of Botulinum Toxin Type A for the Treatment of Focal Upper Limb Poststroke Spasticity
DOC.criteria: Medically stable poststroke patients with spastic muscles in the upper limb Stroke within 6 months of study enrollment Previous therapy with Botulinum Toxin Type A for treatment of any condition prior to 4 months of enrollment, for treatment of any condition prior to 01 January 1998
